data.oai_dc:dc: Parameters characterizing the chemical limnology and spatial attributes of 49 lakes were surveyed as part of the Landscape Position Project. Most parameters are measured at or close to the deepest part of the lake. Chlorophyll is measured by collecting separate integrated samples from the epilimnion, metalimnion, and hypolimnionSampling Frequency: generally monthly for one summer, for some lakes, one or two samples in one summerNumber of sites: 51
